alert.note: Alert for Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 7:14PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Minnesota River near Big Stone Lake affecting Roberts, Big Stone and Grant Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River Big Stone Lake. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 973.0 feet, 40 TO 60 structures inundated, including homes on the Ortonville peninsula. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 971.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 973.5 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 971.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued late Friday night by 415 AM CDT.
